alert.note: Alert for West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 9:13AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 1000 AM MST... At 912 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Olberg, or 10 miles northwest of Casa Grande, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Coolidge, Queen Creek, Blackwater, Chandler Heights, Olberg, San Tan Mountain Park, Stanfield, Sacaton, Santan and Ak- Chin Village. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 175 and 193. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 160 and 167. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 132 and 155. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
